tasks.task: Construct a simple and efficient crop farm.
subtasks: Build double chests at the starting point.
Position hoppers on chests and confirm correct direction.
Measure and place an 8x8 dirt plot.
Add another 8x7 dirt plot adjacent to the first.
Create water troughs by placing blocks around fields.
Construct walls around the farm to contain water.
Pour water into designated buckets to fill the troughs.
Cover the water and secure walls along all sides.
Install dispensers around the perimeter of the farm.
Place blocks over dispensers to cover them.
Set up redstone circuit: place redstone blocks and button.
Position a redstone repeater to ensure proper bucket dispensing.
Decorate the farm with glass walls.
Activate the redstone circuit by pressing the button.
Plant crops in the prepared dirt plots.
Watch the automated system harvest and collect crops.
